00031 
00032 void expect(int n, complex double* A, complex double* V, double* a)
00033 {
00034   int i;
00035   int k,m;
00036 
00037   for (i=0; i<n; i++) {
00038     a[i] = 0.0;
00039     for (m=0; m<n; m++)
00040       for (k=0; k<n; k++)
00041         a[i] += conj(V[k+i*n])*A[k+m*n]*V[m+i*n];
00042   }
00043 }
00044 
00045 
00046 double angroot(double j2)
00047 {
00048   return (-0.5+sqrt(j2+0.25));
00049 }
00050 
00051 
00052 typedef struct {
00053   double rank;
00054   double e;
00055   double j2;
00056   double l2;
00057   double hosci;
00058   double t3;
00059   double pi;
00060 } SingleParticleState;
00061 
00062 
00063 int cmpSingleParticleState(SingleParticleState* spa, SingleParticleState* spb)
00064 {
00065   if (spa->rank < spb->rank)
00066     return +1;
00067   else
00068     return -1;
00069 }

00071 
00072 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00073 {
00074   createinfo(argc, argv);
00075   
00076   int c;
00077   int nljorder=0;
00078   int potentialonly=0;
00079   int cm=0;
00080   double omega=0.0;
00081 
00082   if (argc < 3) {
00083     fprintf(stderr, "\nusage: %s interaction slaterdetfile\n"
00084             "\n   -s           sort sp states according to n, l, j"
00085             "\n   -v           use only potential"
00086             "\n   -o OMEGA     use oscillator constant [MeV]"
00087             "\n   -c           T-Tcm\n",
00088             argv[0]);
00089     exit(-1);
00090   }
00091   
00092   while((c = getopt(argc, argv, "svco:")) != -1)
00093     switch (c) {
00094     case 's':
00095       nljorder = 1;
00096       break;
00097     case 'v':
00098       potentialonly=1;
00099       break;
00100     case 'c':
00101       cm = 1;
00102       break;
00103     case 'o':
00104       omega = atof(optarg)/hbc;
00105       break;
00106     }
00107   
00108   char* interactionfile = argv[optind];
00109   char* slaterdetfile = argv[optind+1];
00110 
00111   Interaction Int;
00112   if (readInteractionfromFile(&Int, interactionfile))
00113     exit(-1);
00114   Int.cm = cm;
00115 
00116   SlaterDet Q;
00117   if (readSlaterDetfromFile(&Q, slaterdetfile))
00118     exit(-1);
00119 
00120   // number of nucleons
00121   int A = Q.A;
00122 
00123   // single-particle overlap matrix
00124   SlaterDetAux X;
00125   initSlaterDetAux(&Q, &X);
00126   calcSlaterDetAux(&Q, &X);
00127 
00128   // Tcm
00129   double tcm;
00130   calcTCM(&Q, &X, &tcm);
00131 
00132   // derive oscillator constant from center of mass motion
00133   double omegacm = 4.0/3.0*tcm;
00134 
00135   if (omega == 0.0)
00136     omega = omegacm;
00137 
00138   complex double n[A*A];
00139   copycmat(A, X.n, n);
00140 
00141   // hartree-fock matrix in Gaussian single-particle basis
00142 
00143   complex double hhf[A*A];
00144   if (potentialonly)    calcPotentialHF(&Int, &Q, &X, hhf);
00145   else                  calcHamiltonianHF(&Int, &Q, &X, hhf);
00146   
00147   complex double l2hf[A*A];
00148   calcl2HF(&Q, &X, l2hf);
00149   
00150   complex double j2hf[A*A];
00151   calcj2HF(&Q, &X, j2hf);
00152 
00153   complex double hoscihf[A*A];
00154   calcHOsciHF(&Q, &X, omega, hoscihf);
00155 
00156   complex double t3hf[A*A];
00157   calct3HF(&Q, &X, t3hf);
00158 
00159   complex double parhf[A*A];
00160   calcparHF(&Q, &X, parhf);
00161 
00162   // solve eigenvalue problem
00163   complex double lambda[A];
00164   complex double V[A*A];
00165   int dim;
00166 
00167   if (nljorder) {
00168     complex double nljhf[A*A];
00169     int i;
00170     for (i=0; i<A*A; i++)
00171       nljhf[i] = 10000*hoscihf[i]/omega - 100*j2hf[i] + l2hf[i];
00172 
00173       generalizedeigensystem(nljhf, n, A, 0.0, lambda, V, &dim);
00174   } else
00175     generalizedeigensystem(hhf, n, A, 0.0, lambda, V, &dim);
00176 
00177   // calculate expectation values
00178   double norm[A];
00179   expect(A, n, V, norm);
00180 
00181   double h[A];
00182   expect(A, hhf, V, h);
00183 
00184   double l2[A];
00185   expect(A, l2hf, V, l2);
00186   
00187   double j2[A];
00188   expect(A, j2hf, V, j2);
00189 
00190   double hosci[A];
00191   expect(A, hoscihf, V, hosci);
00192 
00193   double t3[A];
00194   expect(A, t3hf, V, t3);
00195 
00196   double par[A];
00197   expect(A, parhf, V, par);
00198 
00199   fprintinfo(stdout);
00200 
00201   // sort single-particle states by energy
00202   SingleParticleState sp[A];
00203 
00204   int i;
00205   for (i=0; i<A; i++) {
00206     sp[i].rank = lambda[i];
00207     sp[i].e = h[i]/norm[i];
00208     sp[i].j2 = j2[i]/norm[i];
00209     sp[i].l2 = l2[i]/norm[i];
00210     sp[i].hosci = hosci[i]/norm[i];
00211     sp[i].t3 = t3[i]/norm[i];
00212     sp[i].pi = par[i]/norm[i];
00213   }     
00214   
00215   qsort(sp, A, sizeof(SingleParticleState), cmpSingleParticleState);
00216   
00217   // print proton and neutron levels
00218 
00219   fprintf(stdout, "\nusing oscillator constant: hbar Omega = %8.3f MeV\n",
00220           omega*hbc);
00221 
00222   fprintf(stdout, "\nproton levels:\n");
00223   for (i=0; i<A; i++)
00224     if (sp[i].t3 > 0.0) {
00225       fprintf(stdout, "e: %8.3f MeV, j: %5.3f, l: %5.3f, pi: %+5.2f, nosci: %5.3f\n",
00226               hbc*sp[i].e, angroot(sp[i].j2), angroot(sp[i].l2), sp[i].pi,
00227               sp[i].hosci/omega-1.5);
00228     }
00229 
00230   fprintf(stdout, "\nneutron levels:\n");
00231   for (i=0; i<A; i++)
00232     if (sp[i].t3 < 0.0) {
00233       fprintf(stdout, "e: %8.3f MeV, j: %5.3f, l: %5.3f, pi: %+5.2f, nosci: %5.3f\n",
00234               hbc*sp[i].e, angroot(sp[i].j2), angroot(sp[i].l2), sp[i].pi,
00235               sp[i].hosci/omega-1.5);
00236     }
00237 
00238   return 0;
00239 }
